DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability pharmacokinetics 2-mg lorazepam intravenous administration healthy Japanese adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Study Characterize Safety Pharmacokinetics Single Intravenous Dose Lorazepam Healthy Japanese Adult Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese male and/or female subject nonchildbearing potential . Body Mass Index 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg . History sensitivity lorazepam benzodiazepine . Evidence history acute narrowangle glaucoma sleep apnea syndrome . Significant psychiatric disorder , recurrent episode severe depression , subject serious suicidal risk .
